articles.contents:
Personal information
Name: Yifan Yue
Gender: Female
Birth date:10/10/1999

Address: 207 room, College of Science, China Agricultural University, Beijing, China

Supervisor: Associate Prof.¬†Wentao Zhu
General GPA: 3.47/4.0

China Agricultural University, 2017-2021

PUBLICATIONS
Sinuo Tian, Wei Sun, Xiaoxuan Sun, Yifan Yue, Ming Jia, Shiran Huang, Zhiqiang Zhou, Li Li, Jinling Diao, Sen Yan, Wentao Zhu, Intergenerational reproductive toxicity of parental exposure to prothioconazole and its metabolite on offspring and epigenetic regulation associated with DNA methylation in zebrafish, Environment International
Research Experience:
undergraduate program:
Adsorption of antibiotics on three-dimensional graphene
graduate program:
A Python Tool to find neutral loss in mass spectrum
Download on https://github.com/YiFanYUE99/-A-software-to-find-neutral-loss-/
A Python-based software to search 13C metabolic flux
Download on https://github.com/YiFanYUE99/Metabolicflux/
Predicting colorectal cancer by untargeted mass spectrum combined with machine learning

Download  manuscript
Create an R package to cope with metabolomics data
That‚Äôs a package including mass spectrum data analysis, metabolomics data visualization, and some calculation of metabolomics data.
Download on https://github.com/YiFanYUE99/meTool
Wet lab Skills:
Anatomize zebrafish and mice;
Raise HepG2 cell;
Using Q-TOF-MS.

articles.title: Make a software by Pythonüë©
articles.description: This is the first software I made by Python module tkinter independently and here I record how I have made it.
articles.contents:
Contents
STEP1 Codeing your software with tkinter
STEP2 Build a virtual environment in Anaconda Navigator
STEP3 Install all the modules using in the software to the virtual environment
STEP4 Use pyinstaller to pack your software.
DONE!üòÜ

STEP1 Codeing your software with tkinter
Make sure to install the module tkinter
import tkinter as tk
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import time
Firstly make the window
window=tk.Tk()
Name my software
window.title(‚Äòmass spectrometry data processing‚Äô)
The size of your software
window.geometry(‚Äò1500x900‚Äô)
Label my software
l1=tk.Label(window,text=‚Äòa mass spectrometry data processing software made by Yifan Yue‚Äô,font=(‚ÄúTimes‚Äù,8,‚Äúbold‚Äù))#font=TimesÔºåsize=8Ôºåletters to be bold
l1.place(relx=0.5,rely=0.93,relheight=0.1,relwidth=0.5)
Make the input frame
e1=tk.Entry(window)
e1.place(relx=0.25,rely=0.05,relheight=0.08,relwidth=0.5)
e1.insert(0, ‚ÄúMolecular weight of missing fragments;ex:162.05282‚Äù)
e2=tk.Entry(window)
e2.place(relx=0.25,rely=0.15,relheight=0.08,relwidth=0.5)
e2.insert(0, ‚ÄúAllowable error of molecular weight;ex:0.002‚Äù)
e3=tk.Entry(window)
e3.place(relx=0.25,rely=0.25,relheight=0.08,relwidth=0.5)
e3.insert(0, ‚ÄúAllowable error of retention time;ex:0.1‚Äù)
e4=tk.Entry(window)
e4.place(relx=0.25,rely=0.35,relheight=0.08,relwidth=0.5)
e4.insert(0, ‚ÄúAddress and Name of the first input CSV table‚Äù)
e5=tk.Entry(window)
e5.place(relx=0.25,rely=0.45,relheight=0.08,relwidth=0.5)
e5.insert(0, ‚ÄúAddress and Name of the second input CSV table‚Äù)
e6=tk.Entry(window)
e6.place(relx=0.25,rely=0.55,relheight=0.08,relwidth=0.5)
e6.insert(0, ‚ÄúAddress and Name of the first input CSV table‚Äù)
e7=tk.Entry(window)
e7.place(relx=0.25,rely=0.65,relheight=0.08,relwidth=0.5)
e7.insert(0, ‚ÄúAddress and Name of the second output CSV table‚Äù)
make the text frame
t=tk.Text(window,height=2)
t.place(relx=0.25,rely=0.75,relheight=0.08,relwidth=0.5)
My function to be run




Make the button
b1=tk.Button(window,text=‚Äòsearch‚Äô,command=func)
b1.place(relx=0.25,rely=0.85,relheight=0.08,relwidth=0.5)
Finally make your whole window work
window.mainloop()
STEP2 Build a virtual environment in Anaconda Navigator
If your navigator doesn‚Äôt work, cut off the Internet and restart it



STEP3 Install all the modules using in the software to the virtual environment
In the terminal of the new virtual environment:
print:
pip install pyinstaller
pip install numpy
pip install pandas
STEP4 Use pyinstaller to pack your software.
In the terminal of the new virtual environment :
set the path to your .py document 
cd /d d:
Your disk saving the py document 
cd (your directory)
pyinstaller -F -w neutralloss.py
However, something wrong happened
Just do what CMD told you, problem solved!
DONE!üòÜ
-The code can be download here.
